pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with the Emir of Qatar, H.H. Sheikh Tamim Bin Hamad Al Thani | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with the Emir of Qatar, H.H. Sheikh Tamim Bin Hamad Al Thani.

The leaders discussed bilateral relations and the current diplomatic dispute affecting the Gulf region.  

Prime Minister Trudeau noted the importance of maintaining stability within the Gulf Cooperation Council and wider Middle East.  The Prime Minister raised Canadaâ€™s concern with the funding of terrorism and extremism, wherever it takes place, and emphasized the value of maintaining an open dialogue amongst disputing parties.

The leaders further discussed the need to de-escalate current tensions, limit the impact on affected families in the region, and continue to address the root causes of terrorism.
